tumble.game

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • tumble.game.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the map that the player can explore.
    Version:
    May 10, 2020
    Author:
    Amanda Xu, Julia Gu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs a map of the area that the player can explore from a file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns an array of the map's items.
      java.util.ArrayList<Platform> getPlatforms()
      Returns an array of this map's platforms.
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float getPlayerLocation()
      Returns the player's starting location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs a map of the area that the player can explore from a file. Has platforms and items.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of text file from which map is read
